name: Driving shapes-3D game
description:
Shapes is a 3D endless running game, based on six main shapes.
*******************************************************************
How to play?
Each time you hit the hammer your shape will be changed to one of these six shapes (Cube, Sphere, Cylinder, Pyramid, Cone, Hexagon) so, to stay alive you have to do two main things, firstly, avoid obstacles and secondly enter the suitable gate based on your shape after collecting the key of it. The distance you reach will be your score and you can see your rank using the leaderboard, you have to keep in mind that your shape's speed will be increased over time. This game is simple but it needs focusing. 
*******************************************************************
Features:
1- Colorful.
2- Simple.
3- Challenging.
4- Smooth control.
5- Interactive physics.
6- Interactive sound effects.
7- Contains leaderboard.
*******************************************************************
Download it now for free and challenge your friends.
Enjoy it!
